item.title: SHE SAID YES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
item.description:
!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
It's not easy to surprise someone you live with and want to spend every free hour with With her parent's help we had all 6 of our dogs at their place
We went hiking and then stopped by her parents house I led her into the backyard while she's wondering why all the dogs are there and a couple random strangers with cameras
I had this whole speech planned, I rehearsed it for WEEKS and it was about 75 seconds But when I got down on one knee the entire world stopped and the only thing that came out was -
"Every aspect of my life is better because you are a part of it. I love you. Will you marry me?"
A huge shout-out to @plantaindreams for the assist I asked them if they knew anyone that could stop by and take pictures and they knew someone. Just a kind lady with a cell phone and she helped us capture the moment for the rest of time.
And I didn't plan this, but her mom's Ring Camera even recorded the entire proposal and all the love after it was perfect
And everything that didn't go perfect - One of the old dogs getting his foot stuck in a bag and dragging it back and forth of the proposal Me grabbing her hand but it had a dog diaper in it Me forgetting everything I wanted to say - It all ended up being hilarious and a wonderful part of the memory
Her parents were so stoked Next week we'll go to my dad's memory care home, he's struggling with alzheimers And we'll do the proposal in front of him too so he can be a part of it.
The woman that changed my life That makes me feel like the most loved person in the world Is now going to marry me. The greatest weekend of my entire life.
item.dc:creator: MrPuckett

another day. more memes. enjoy!
and stuffie.

ye!

when you dont have any happiness in the first place hard for anything to kill it.
I am the horrors?
The above image was made by the wonderful @PyroDragon! They have their own channel in the Deviousness discord where they share links to their dumps and be an all around dragony dragon! I has a Deviousness discord server! We do have a hard rule of no politics and/or religion. The discord is a safe space to get away from the bullshit going on. We have a bunch of areas including a SFW area, content creator area, a NSFW area and more! We have gaming fun! We have spontaneous gaming and some ping roles for people to use to get groups together based on US and EU time zones! We have movie nights on Saturdays! So feel free to wander in and say haii! Thank you to everyone who has joined and made it such a unique and special place! Deviousness discord that is 18+: https://discord.gg/deviousness If you have issues with link see dis: https://imgur.com/a/8GUNAz4 Deviousness steam group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/DeviousnessDiscord
artist of work above (aside from my signing potato on it): https://florahv.artstation.com/projects/XnL8P3 I am on dis now and trying to remember to linky over there too for when I post and also post the memes that get removed: https://bsky.app/profile/potatocheesmonk.bsky.social I has a post with links to all my past posts. enjoy: https://imgur.com/a/ZDA2CBe #deliciousness #potato #memes #dailydirties

item.title: Who says women ain't funny? This shit's HILARIOUS!
item.description: Have you previously had even a slight bias against female humor? Regardless of who came up with the humor, these ladies executed it SO WELL. If you had that bias, I quote the late great comedian Norm Macdonald, "Now you don't know what the hell to do, do ya?" I hope you smile or crack a mental smirk today, from this or an unrelated thing - even if only a brief moment. Cheers!!
item.dc:creator: epicurusaquinas

item.title: Welp, guess Christmas is canceled
item.description: We all knew it was happening, furniture sales have been tanking the last few years and they've been cutting hours for weeks. No ones mad about getting fired, we all expected it, but we aer all pissed off at how the did it. The told us on Saturday to be here on Monday at 8 am. Were off Sunday and Monday, they refused to tell us anything about the meeting and even got angry when we questioned them. They gave us a 2 day notice of termination for the entire delivery team. We were supposed to work tomorrow and now we have less than a day to find work before we start loosing hours. They could have said something Saturday and gave us a heads up, they could have done any other day of the week, but they choose to not to. And now they want us to sign a severance agreement for $500 that bars us from any form of compensation for any reason, known or unknown, legal or illegal, fair or otherwise. Even unemployment would be signed away. All of this mid holiday season in a town where no ones hiring. And they had the audacity to act upset about it. Whats even funnier is just last year they opened the larges store yet, spent hundreds of thousands to do so in the riches neighborhood in New Orleans. And it was a complete flop. So now we pay the price for their mistakes and they want us to agree not to file unemployment. So thats that, no job, no savings, no car, and no fall back plan. This year sucks so much.

item.title: Schumer must Resign!
item.description: Understand that this is the rotating villain structure that has undermined Biden & Obamas agendas. They’re “the moderates” that play the spoiler & weaken Democrates. They must be excised. Why they are so relaxed is that they hope that we forget. Traitors! CCM -- Not up until 2028 Hassan -- Not up until 2028 Shaheen -- Not running again Kaine -- Not up until 2030 King -- Not up until 2030 Buuuut New Hampshire can do something. Shaheen and Hassan (the bitch who is working so hard against higher minimum Wage btw.) will be challenged. Karishma Manzur https://www.karishmaforsenate.com/ and Chris Pappas https://chrispappas.org/ are running for their Senate seats.

item.title: Memes/tomfoolery
item.description:
"I'll come back someday." "...Why?"
A couple of years ago my check engine light turned off because I was running late for work and hauled ass on the freeway. I've always known it to be called an Italian tune-up even though I'm in California and we don't really have beef with the Italians
Bev Jackson?
If I have the day off and have to drive during morning traffic I'll drive WAY slow. Just kidding, can you imagine?
I'm way above average, I got forearms like Popeye!
Is this true?
Sorry everything's so shitty, guys. Also, sorry for being so chatty in the margins. I slept really badly last night and I'm clinging to caffeine like a koala.

item.title: Way too many people are in denial, but what happened to day has once again made this abundantly clear.
item.description: And yes, it's clearly more than just those Eight senators. Party leadership let those eight break off because they have safe seats so they can take the blame without consequences. This was obviously a choice that most Democrats in congress were perfectly fine with, and unless they're extremely and unambiguously vocal about their objections to this you should assume that they supported this decision.
